description:
At Triplett McFall Wolfe Law, LLC, we are devoted to defending people in Bellefontaine, Ohio, and the surrounding counties against criminal charges. Our law office handles the full spectrum of criminal law issues, including DWI/DUI, misdemeanors, felonies and domestic violence charges. We also are adept at defending and prosecuting civil protection order petitions.

The team at our law office has decades of combined experience in both trial and appellate courts. To preserve our clients' time and resources, however, we strive to resolve issues before they ever reach litigation. We have successfully obtained case dismissals, reduced charges and other favorable arrangements on behalf of countless people.

Clients turn to our attorneys for guidance during some of their most troublesome times because:

  • We listen to their concerns.
  • We develop customized strategies for the strongest possible defense.
  • We use every resource at our disposal throughout the case.

When facing a criminal charge, someone's future and freedom are on the line. At our law office, we understand the importance of responding quickly to a client's questions. We speak honestly and always paint a clear picture of what people may expect as they go through the process. Triplett McFall Wolfe Law, LLC, offers free initial consultations and accepts credit cards.
